item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

[quote=“P R 0 Rusher, post:12, topic:367615”][quote author=Dastan_ link=topic=463767.msg3393269#msg3393269 date=1289129422]
READ.

} else { sM("You have to be a donator or a staff member to use this feature"); }
[/quote]

Dude It Wont Work Can You Put It In I Did Make That Only Donators Can Yell But It Wont Send Anything When Normal Player Trys To Yell -.-

}
if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() >4 && donator >= 1) {
if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - yellTimer >= 10000)) {
String titles = “”;
String titles2 = “”;
String text = command.substring(5);
{
if (Wins >= 0)
{
titles = “Beginner”;
}
if (Wins >= 50)
{
titles = “Prod”;
}
if (Wins >= 100)
{
titles = “Pker”;
}
if (Wins >= 150)
{
titles = “Kickass”;
}
if (Wins >= 200)
{
titles = “Badass”;
}
if (Wins >= 250)
{
titles = “Legit”;
}
if (Wins >= 300)
{
titles = “Prodigy”;
}
if (Wins >= 400)
{
titles = “Champion”;
}
if (Wins >= 500)
{
titles = “Master”;
}
if (Wins >= 600)
{
titles = “Grandmaster”;
}
if (Wins >= 700)
{
titles = “Legend”;
}
if (Wins >= 800)
{
titles = “God”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles2 = "Donator ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles2 = "Mod ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles2 = "Admin “;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Sherman”)) {
titles2 = “Owner “;
}
yell(”[”+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +”]:@dre@ "+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
yellTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
} else {
sM(“You Must Wait 10 Seconds To Yell!”);
}
}[/quote]

Learn to use codes god damn it.

@Topic; Normal players can’t yell because you made it so.

         They do not get theyr message because you only made that [u][i]else[/i][/u] statement for donators who yells more than 1 time in 10 seconds! 

         Use your head.

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:6, topic:367615”]Use your head.

[code=cmf]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1 && donator >= 1) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Moderator]-";              
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin] -";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner]- ";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Mod/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner/Donator]-";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@gre@[Super Donator]-@gre@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "@yel@[Mod/Super Donator]-@red@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "@red@[Admin/Super Donator]-@red@ ";
            }
            if (donator == 2 && playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "@whi@[Owner/Super Donator]-@whi@ ";
            }
            yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                    + command.substring(5));

} else {
sM(“You have to be a donator or a staff member to use this feature”);
}[/code][/quote]

Bra Dont Say Those Kinda Things

First Read What I Posted I Wanne Keep That -.-

Isnt There A Other Way?

Read full topic

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:367615”][code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == -1) {
String text = command.substring(5);

            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": "
                    + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
                    + text.substring(1) + "";
        } else if (playerRights >= -1) {
            sendMessage("You aren't a donator, so you can't yell or whatever.");
        }
    }
}[/code][/quote]

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights == -1) {
String text = command.substring(5);

            PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": "
                    + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0))
                    + text.substring(1) + "";
        } else if (playerRights >= -1) {
            sendMessage("You aren't a donator, so you can't yell or whatever.");
        }
    }
}[/code]

item.title: Yell
item.dc:creator: @P_R_0_Rusher P R 0 Rusher
item.description:
@P_R_0_Rusher wrote:

Hello,
I wanne make yell for donator can somewane tell me how and how to send a frame like Sorry, You need to be Donator To Yell
And how to add starter items
Please Somewane Help

Thanks!!

if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 4) {
if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - yellTimer >= 10000)) {
String titles = “”;
String titles2 = “”;
String text = command.substring(5);
{
if (Wins >= 0)
{
titles = “Beginner”;
}
if (Wins >= 50)
{
titles = “Prod”;
}
if (Wins >= 100)
{
titles = “Pker”;
}
if (Wins >= 150)
{
titles = “Kickass”;
}
if (Wins >= 200)
{
titles = “Badass”;
}
if (Wins >= 250)
{
titles = “Legit”;
}
if (Wins >= 300)
{
titles = “Prodigy”;
}
if (Wins >= 400)
{
titles = “Champion”;
}
if (Wins >= 500)
{
titles = “Master”;
}
if (Wins >= 600)
{
titles = “Grandmaster”;
}
if (Wins >= 700)
{
titles = “Legend”;
}
if (Wins >= 800)
{
titles = “God”;
}
if (donator == 1) {
titles2 = "Donator ";
}
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles2 = "Mod ";
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles2 = "Admin “;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Sherman”)) {
titles2 = “Owner “;
}
yell(”[”+titles2 + titles + " " + playerName +”]:@dre@ "+ Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
yellTimer = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
} else {
sM(“You must wait 10 seconds between yells!”);
}
}

Read full topic
